page.title: 18VILLAGE LIFE STYLES
page.content: The area contains a large proportion of young families, the adults being fairly affluent,unemployment not seriously affecting their lives. Most families have a lifestyle which is home orientated,including children in daily activities,taking annual holidays and supporting children in school and recreational activities. Many young families participate in sporting activities using the facilities at Stocksbridge,Sheffield and Hillsborough.Gardening is a weekend ritual undertaken by many residents,the gardens always looking beautiful. Most families enjoy an evening meal together.
